article.title: DRC Receives Air Force Depot Work Worth $3.7 Million
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has received a $3.7 million task order under its General Services Administration Logistics Worldwide contract. This effort, awarded through the Air Logistics Center at Hill Air Force Base, Utah, provides continued program management and logistics support activities in support of the management, analysis and evaluation of performance metrics, parts availability data, production status, and funds and forecast information for the 417th Supply Chain Management Squadron, Ogden Air Logistics Center, Utah.
